name: I Want A Dream
description:
I Want A Dream is a difficult platformer game, it's a die and learn game where every time you play a level you advance more and more.

It's played with a keyboard, you can redefine all the keys and the sound options.

Every stage has a checkpoint in the middle of the level and when you finish the level you will get a password to continue from there any time.

The preset keys are W, A, S, D and P for pause.

I hope you like it, any comment or suggestion are more than welcome.
